<title level="1" right="Focus 6" pfs="Standard">
[Flaming Fusillade](/Spells.aspx?ID=2080)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=721" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=561" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=604" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=645" />
<trait label="Oracle" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=319" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 259 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Mystery**
[Flames](/Mysteries.aspx?ID=16)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You call upon an endless barrage of flames, a series of explosions bursting around you like miniature suns. You cast [_ignition_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1565) as part of casting _flaming fusillade_. For the duration of _flaming fusillade_, _ignition's_ casting time is reduced from 2 actions to 1.

---
**Heightened (9th)** For the duration, you also gain a status bonus to damage dealt by _ignition_ equal to _flaming fusillade's_ spell rank.
name: Flaming Fusillade
